title: Digital Garage Enhances Payment Aggregation Platform via AEON Pay Integration
tags: Digital Garage Updates ‘App Pay’ Platform to Bypass App Store Fees Following Regulatory ShiftDigital Garage has made a significant update to “App Pay,” its third-party payment platform for mobile applications. The new user interface features a “Link-Out” capability designed to align directly with Japan’s “Act on Promotion of Competition for Certain Smartphone Software” (Smartphone Act), which came into full enforcement on December 18,Japan FinTech ObserverNorbert Gehrke
